    public class ChapterActivity
extends BaseActivity
implements ChapterContract.View, android.support.v4.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout.OnRefreshListener, android.view.View.OnClickListener
    This activity is a UI controller for displaying a list of chapters and managing their state
